Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.application

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.application.GUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Main
    public abstract class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds the Graphic User Interface.

        public void setDebugMode​(boolean debug)
        Enable or disable debug mode, no dialogs will be produced while in debug mode.
        Parameters:

        public void onGameTimeTick()
        Actions to be processed on every gameTimer tick. Does actions for game end.

        Start the game process.

      • gameStop

        public void gameStop​(java.lang.String dialogMessage,
                     java.lang.String dialogTitle,
                     boolean gameOver)
        Stops the game running, with a JDialog containing custom messages. Saves and loads replay of game just played.
        Parameters:
        dialogMessage - Message to be on JDialog.
        dialogTitle - Title of the JDialog.

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer​(Direction direction)
        Helper method to move the player and repaint the renderer.
        Parameters:
        direction - Direction to move player.

      • replayStep

        public int replayStep​(boolean auto,
                      java.lang.String action,
                      int step,
                      int size)
        Perform a step in the replay, specified by the point and it's action. Shuts down the controls window if finished.
        Parameters:
        auto - If true, the replay is running on a timer, if false, no timer
        action - The action to perform
        step - The number of the step
        size - Size of the original list of actions.
        Returns:
        Returns the position in original list post incrementation

      • processKeyEvent

        public void processKeyEvent​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Process any KeyEvent encountered.
        Parameters:
        e - KeyEvent to process

      • checkMove

        public void checkMove​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Process KeyEvent determined to be a move, checking if it could be a valid move, and call associated methods if true.
        Parameters:
        e - KeyEvent that occurred.

      • getDirectionFromKey

        public Direction getDirectionFromKey​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Get Direction enum value from KeyEvent.
        Parameters:
        e - KeyEvent to get direction from
        Returns:
        Returns Direction if applicable, or null if not.

      • repaintAll

        public void repaintAll()
        Update and repaint all components which tend to change regularly, such as panel repainting and counter texts.

      • processToFile

        public void processToFile​(boolean hasContent,
                          boolean freshLevel)
        Process the final game state to a final for next opening.
        Parameters:
        hasContent - True if something needs to be stored, false is not
        freshLevel - True if opening new level, false if opening save

      • processStartFile

        public boolean processStartFile()
        Process the start file, status.txt, and process any actions it requires from the last time the application was run.
        Returns:
        Returns true if new game is created, false if not.

      • replayLoad

        public void replayLoad()
        Load the replay file and reset the replay object.

        Load the replay from a specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - File to load from.

      • persistenceLoad

        public void persistenceLoad​(boolean isState)
        Load the level file to play from.
        Parameters:
        isState - If true, load a pre-played and saved level. If false, load a fresh version of a level.

      • persistenceLoad

                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
